question: More and more newspapers and news channels are using photographs to support their news articles and stories.some people think that photographs are not reliable source of news while others considered photographs to be in irrefusable double. Discuss both the sides and give your opinion.
text: Technological development brings a lot of changes in the presentation of news in different channels and newspapers such as addition of pictures along with their respective news. Some people believe that the attachment of photos along with news articles are not a proper method while others think that it is essential. This is a will discuss both view points before arriving to my opinion.

To commence with, pictures of various news sometimes may not be a accurate because there are a lot of chances for fabrication. Nowadays, modern technological gadgets provide enough facilities to make an error in photographs that sometimes create fake news. For example, in the present days, the newspaper agencies and channels focusing more on the growth of the company than the reliability of news. This type of aims force the companies to fabricate the photographs of news to arise anxiety in public that leads to misunderstanding of the particular issue. Therefore, the pictures related to some crucial news articles sometimes may not be real or more precise.

On the contrary, one of the best methods to catch the attention of the public to a social issue or incident is a proper pictorial presentation of news. Usually, people are interested to read or watch news that includes the photograph of the incident that provide a quick understanding about the specific issue. For instance, if the public wants to report some social problems such as water pollution to the government they can take the assistance of newspapers or channels with the actual picture of polluted water resources.
There are chances of fraud in photographs, in my opinion, news descriptions along with a picture are a suitable method and also it provides proper knowledge about the story easily.

To conclude, the reality of a news easily makes as fake with a man made picture presentation, but, in present days people are more interested in the pictorial representation of news. Hence, the photographs in editorials on use descriptions might be trustworthy or invalid.
